name: GliderGun - A Suite of Tools for Easily Creating Browser-Based Operating Systems
description: This project provides a suite of tools that allows for the easy creation of Linux distributions. The primary purpose of the created distributions is to use a web browser, and by limiting the functionality in this way, various benefits can be obtained.
